title: 1887 Allen & Ginter (N28) Advertising Poster Lot of 24 Cards Comiskey,John L Sullivan
author: jdl7860

posts.post_title: 1887 Allen & Ginter (N28) Advertising Poster Lot of 24 Cards Comiskey,John L Sullivan
posts.post_content:
Interesting lot of 24 cards cut from one of the most iconic advertising pieces in the hobby! These cards were hand cut and glued into a scrapbook, from which I removed them. They are in excellent condition, with just a couple having paper loss on the backs. They are a slightly thinner paper stock than the regular issued cards, but thicker than regular paper.  The two poster corners are included in this auction as well. They measure 6.5" tall x 5.5" wide. $250 delivered. Paypal please.

the O'Neil "card" is from a different company - it's a Kimball's cut or card and not Ginter.....
You are right, I missed that. It is a slightly different stock as well. Thanks
